906490.name: Gamers Club
906490.description:
We are the largest CS:GO club in the world. Our platform has the largest base of active players in Latin America and through it we connect and foster the scenario with content, training, championships, awards, broadcasts and announcements.

We work with a club where you can pay a monthly fee and have access to various features and benefits. Also, everyone playing at Gamers Club has guaranteed a 128 tick rate server to have fun with friends and make that good spray!

We do this because we are passionate about the eSports world and we want to develop the community to gain more and more space on the world stage.
